name: Knights of the Throne
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Skyfall and The King's Heroes.

The Knights of the Throne are an elite group of warriors entrusted with the duty of serving the people through protecting the throne. Though their glory days have passed and most of the kingdom barely remembers them, they will be called to duty once more, and they will answer.

Lasha is the leader of the Knights, a young woman of honor and strength. Deadly with a blade and pure in her heart, she will volunteer to take on a perilous path to protect the kingdom from an army of enemies never seen before.

FEATURES


* An emotional story of sacrifice and commitment
* Beautiful locations with incredible visuals
* Sidequests to complete
* Optional bosses to defeat
* Mouse support
* Auto-save function
